title: Fix arm-unknown-linux-musleabi build
body: Use cross build docker image `rustembedded/cross:arm-unknown-linux-musleabi-0.2.1`. Waiting for this issue solved: https://github.com/rust-lang/libc/issues/1848 , then we can back to image `rustembedded/cross:arm-unknown-linux-musleabi`

title: Allow passing in an optional plugin_arg
body:
To be used by https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-android/pull/2585.

@madeye Please review?

title: Add arm-unknown-linux-musleabi release
body: Some old routers (like xiaomi R1D/R2D) could use arm-unknown-linux-musleabi release.

title: Add split support to the UDP client
body: Adds split support to the client that allows concurrent access to the splited halves from different tasks.

title: fix data decryption in UDP ServerClient
Fix `conflicts_with` related errors
body:
Fixed #284 

> conflicts_with
> > NOTE: Conflicting rules take precedence over being required by default. Conflict rules only need to be set for one of the two arguments, they do not need to be set for each.

title: Add support for MIPS
body: I will finish build script soon, maybe...

title: Remove the VPN option hack
body: Remove the previous hack, according to the discussion here: https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-rust/pull/278

title: Fix the tx/rx update in ProxyStream
body:
This reverts commit 205eaa95addbb56fccc3d0d34705a92e79c8086b.

Reported in this bug: https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-android/issues/2561

Also fix the tx/rx in ProxyStream

title: Remove uses of pin_project::project attribute
body:
pin-project will deprecate the project attribute due to some unfixable
limitations.

Refs: https://github.com/taiki-e/pin-project/issues/225

*Although the deprecation of the project attribute has not been released yet, this PR is submitted in advance to avoid the CI from being broken by deprecated warnings.*

title: Connect UDP sockets
body: Fixes #263. Untested.

title: Refine udprelay
body:
1. I think there is no need to be actively waking up and closing UDP connections.
2. More robust against IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses.

title: Warn when using tokio DNS resolver
body: Fixes #208. Untested.

title: Refine support for MX and NS records in DNS relay
body: Added additional data examination for MX and NS records as per RFC. Probably will not be useful ever. Untested.

title: Be more conservative when skipping resolving
body: As we examine CNAME records in answer section and possibly A/AAAA records in additional section, we should only skip the second stage only if the entire ACL is empty.

title: Add option for max number of UDP associations
body: https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-rust/issues/252

title: Examine additional record only if name matches
[#243] Support cross compiling for aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
body:
Latest Ubuntu Server 20.04 LTS released with rpi 64bit support.
It might be better than using Raspbian.
https://ubuntu.com/download/raspberry-pi

title: Let DNS relay run on TCP as well
body:
I tried integrating `trust-dns-server`, it turns out that using it will block the entire thread (it takes a `&Runtime` as input). To be fair, I suspect there is anything we can really use from trust-dns besides `trust-dns-proto`.

P.S. This TCP server closes connection for every query. This should not be an issue as the relay should run locally.

body: As per previous discussions.

title: Fix bugs in #235
body: Details in https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-rust/pull/238

title: Fix bugs in #235
body:
1. Fix the return value of `acl::check_ip_in_proxy_list`.
2. Fix the condition order in `context::check_ip_in_proxy_list`
3. Keep the value whether the qname is resolved by remote or local in `add_to_reverse_lookup_cache`

Tested locally, all routes in Android client should work now.

body: Beware of rookie mistakes lol.

Revert "CLAP: Simple parameter configuration replaced with macro expressions"
body: Reverts shadowsocks/shadowsocks-rust#219

title: CLAP: Simple parameter configuration replaced with macro expressions
DNS relay refactor and improvements
body:
- Allow working in standalone mode
- Use same UDP socket for sending response packet
- Send TCP queries with ProxyStream directly

ref #213

https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-android/pull/2454

ACL (domain name) works now.

title: Add DNS relay for Android
body: It maybe also useful for `ssredir` and `sslocal`.

title: Multiple changes for shadowsocks-android
body:
This PR added:

1. Protect socket logic for Android.
2. Misc fixes for Android VPNService.

I think some rework and cleanup are still needed, especially for the interfaces.

title: Fix the build without trust-dns
body: If disabling the `trust-dns` feature, there will be a compilation error, as `dns_resolver` is not defined.

title: Disable set_nofile in Android build
body:
RLIMT_NOFILE is private in Android system, so just disable the function here.

Not sure if this change will break the build/function on other platforms.

title: ssserver supports binding local address for connecting remote
body: Ref #26

title: reduce loops and type conversions
body: reduce loops and type conversions

title: Add a tunnel app
body:
It can be used to benchmark.

Usage:
sstunnel -v -s 127.0.0.1:8488 -m plain -k password -b 127.0.0.1:1090 -f 127.0.0.1:5201

"-f xxx" : the target/forwad address xxx

title: Migrate to std::future, async/await
body:
- [x] Socks5 Protocol Library
- [x] TCP Relay Tools
- [ ] DNS Resolving (dep: https://github.com/bluejekyll/trust-dns/pull/849)
    - [ ] Build with tokio's 0.2.x
- [x] `ring` upgrades to `v0.16.x`
    - [x] Ring removed support of SHA1 algorithm, uses separated crate `hkdf` and `sha1`
- [x] TCP Relay
- [x] UDP Relay
- [ ] <del>DNS Proxy</del>
- [x] Binaries (`sslocal`, `ssserver`, <del>`ssdns`</del>)
- [x] Tests
- [x] Windows
